title: Game of Being — World I · Level 1 — Who Am I?
subtitle: A Playable Philosophy of Attention, Breath, and Self
author: Mohammad Amir Khusru Akhtar (Shunya)
amazonSummary: Game of Being invents its own genre: playable philosophy. Don’t just read philosophy—play it. World I is a practice of awareness—a meditation written as a video game. Level 1 (“Who Am I?”) opens where the game actually runs: inside your attention…

bullets: Every time you notice breath instead of fear, you’ve saved.
Every time you pause before reacting, you’ve leveled up.
Every time you see mind acting instead of being lost inside it, you’ve unlocked another door.
